products.title: Ahoy Indigo Roman Blind

products.title: Leyton Royal Purple Roman Blind
products.description: Spruce up your favourite space with this beautifully simple leyton royal purple roman blind. A dark and subdued purple shade is applied to the softest of fabrics for a finish thats at once classy and cosy. The earthy, heather shade is perfect for harmonising with greys and ot spruce up your favourite space with this beautifully simple leyton royal purple roman blind.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Plum Roman Blind
products.description: Extremely lavish and luxurious, this plum coloured roman blind will give you a taste of opulence and make your home feel regal. The soft velvet with its crushed finish looks positively sumptuous. Purple is the classic royal tone and we think this blind will look fabulous in an el extremely lavish and luxurious, this plum coloured roman blind will give you a taste of opulence and make your home feel regal.

products.title: Fairhaven Indigo Blossom Roman Blind
products.description: A delightful floral border pattern, this fairhaven indigo blossom roman blind is a thing of beauty. Picked out in beautiful painterly blues and purples it can be a real showstopper at your window. This blind is ideal for adding a touch of complementary pattern to your decor, it's a delightful floral border pattern, this fairhaven indigo blossom roman blind is a thing of beauty.

products.title: Plush Velvet Mulberry Roman Blind
products.description: The deep, zesty purple of this plush velvet mulberry roman blinds is warming and cosy and makes it the perfect blind for comfortable living spaces. The fabric is soft and smooth and the thickness of it will keep your home feeling warm and relaxed, while the fiery colourway look the deep, zesty purple of this plush velvet mulberry roman blinds is warming and cosy and makes it the perfect blind for comfortable living spaces.

products.title: Shibori Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet beautiful. This shibori blind is simply beautiful. Its heavily influenced by traditional japanese design but the painted print and the depth of colour have an incredibly modern feel. Wherever it hails from, what results is a stunningly stylish piece of art that wil simple yet beautiful.

products.title: Fretwork Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Like a patchwork of tiles, full of mediterranean influence, this fretwork indigo roman blind creates a scene of tranquility, rejuvenation and beauty, no matter where its hung. products.title: Leaf Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Gigantic leaves and deep, luscious colour. Now if thats not a combination of pure sophistication, we don't know what is. This harlequin additions design makes a great roman blind, offering a statement piece to your windows, as well as exquisite shading.

products.title: Gainsborough Mulberry Roman Blind
products.description: A classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home. This gainsborough mulberry roman blind takes traditional tartan and infuses it with rich berry shades alongside neutral and natural tones to great effect. The end result is a beautiful, cosy window dress a classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home.

products.description: Emma bridgewaters popular polka dot pattern is full of cheerfulness.
